name: Just Cause 3: Gold Edition
summary:
The Just Cause 3 Gold Edition packs the critically acclaimed Just Cause 3 game as well as a great selection of extra missions, explosive weapons and vehicles to expand your experience in Medici. This ultimate edition of the game will please newcomers who want to jump into all of Rico's missions with a boosted arsenal and exotic new vehicles. 
 
This pack includes the following items: 
 
Air, Land and Sea Expansion. 
Weaponised Vehicle Pack. 
Explosive Weapon Pack. 
Reaper Missile Mech. 
Kousavá Rifle.
